text: Aleksandar Gruev () (born July 24, 1983) is a retired Bulgarian professional basketball player. ==Professional career== During his career, Gruev has played in Romania, Georgia, Iran and Slovenia. On 30 September 2014, Gruev signed with Bulgarian champions PBC Lukoil Academic. ==External links== * at basketball.eurobasket.com * at basketball.realgm.com * at fiba.com * at eurobasket2011.com * at balkanleague.net Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Bulgarian men's basketball players Category:Bulgarian expatriate sportspeople in Romania Category:Bulgarian expatriates in Georgia (country) Category:Bulgarian expatriates in Iran Category:Bulgarian expatriates in Slovenia Category:Shooting guards Category:BC Balkan players Category:Sportspeople from Sofia
title: Aleksandar Gruev
